items.title: Where in the world are all the rare earths?
items.standfirst: Unlike the name suggests, rare earths are not very rare at all. The critical minerals are found in abundance in many countries, but being big on reserves may not mean big business.
items.content: Unlike the name suggests, rare earths are not very rare at all. The critical minerals are found in abundance in many countries, but being big on reserves may not mean big business.

ai_summary: Rare earths are not actually very rare.
Critical minerals are found in many countries.
Being big on reserves may not mean big business.
The article discusses the location of rare earths.
Rare earths are found in abundance.

clusters.title: After five weeks of evidence, this is what we know about the Mark Haines mystery
clusters.neutral_headline: Investigation Continues Regarding Indigenous Teenager's Death

items.title: After five weeks of evidence, this is what we know about the Mark Haines mystery
items.standfirst: Some key questions about the death of Indigenous teenager Mark Haines are still unanswered after a coronial inquest spanning five weeks.
items.content: Some key questions about the death of Indigenous teenager Mark Haines are still unanswered after a coronial inquest spanning five weeks.

ai_summary: A coronial inquest examined evidence for five weeks regarding Mark Haines' death.
Key questions about the death of the Indigenous teenager remain unanswered.
The inquest provided a detailed examination of the circumstances surrounding the death.
Evidence presented included witness testimonies and forensic analysis.
The investigation seeks to determine the cause and circumstances of the death.
